virtual bool Finish (UInt32T originalFormat, IMP4SinfAtom *sinf)=0
 Add drm information into sinf atom.

Detailed Description

Encrypts MP4 data with Sinf signalling.

It is used to encrypt track samples, and add neccessary information for decryption.

Definition at line 28 of file IMPEG4SinfDRMEncryptor.h.

virtual bool DRMPlugin::MPEG4SinfDRMPlugin::IMPEG4SinfDRMEncryptor::EncryptSample (  ByteT *  sampleBuffer,
UInt32T  sampleSize,
ByteT **  encSampleData,
UInt32T *  encSampleLen
)  [pure virtual]
 

Encrypt sample sampleBuffer.

Returns encrypted sample in encSampleData.

Parameters:
sampleBuffer input, sample to be encrypted.
sampleSize input, size of input sample.
encSampleData output, encrypted sample.
encSampleLen output, size of encrypted sample.
Returns:
Boolean indicating success or failure.

virtual bool DRMPlugin::MPEG4SinfDRMPlugin::IMPEG4SinfDRMEncryptor::Finish (  UInt32T  originalFormat,
IMP4SinfAtom *  sinf
)  [pure virtual]
 

Add drm information into sinf atom.

Caller must take care that given sinf atom really coresponds to sample description atom which refers to encrypted samples.

Parameters:
originalFormat input, 4CC code of the original data format.
sinf input-output, sinf atom where to add drm information.
Returns:
Boolean indicating success or failure.
